translator_guide_0: This section provides guidance to translators, offering insights into internal details:
translator_guide_1: 1. Some lang lines have corresponding locale context, particularly the formatter lines. Understanding these contexts helps translators comprehend how the lang line function. Translating these lines is unnecessary.
translator_guide_2: 2. Certain lines contain line break format(\n). translator can add/remove that format at will based on the actual length of the translated text.

item.mmorpg.currency.desc.affix_common_r: Re-rolls a random affix into a Common Rarity Random Affix.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.affix_tier_up_: Unpredictably Adds or removes a tier from a random affix.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.chaos_orb: DANGER! Corrupts the item, either destroying it, or upgrading it. Also sets Potential to 0, meaning the item can never be crafted on again.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.entangled_affi: Either Upgrades a random affix, or Corrupts the Item, making it Unmodifiable.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.entangled_pote: Either Adds 25 Potential to the item or Corrupts the Item, making it Unmodifiable.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.entangled_qual: Either Randomly Upgrades Quality of An Item (1-5%) or Corrupts the Item, making it Unmodifiable.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.entangled_uniq: Either Upgrades unique stats by +10% or Corrupts the Item, making it Unmodifiable.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.jewel_corrupt: Corrupts a Jewel, granting it additional stats. Has a chance to Destroy it!
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.level_up_orb: Increases gear level, maximum 5 uses on an item.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.map_rarity_upg: Upgrades Map Rarity. Maps with higher rarities can drop better and higher rarity gear but are also more difficult to beat.
